room_title: Escape room "Escape From Gnomes" by Play Live Escape in San Jose
review: Had an awesome time trying to escape  from gnomes. Cool entertainment- finally something new. Hope every one can have this kind of experience. The staff was  nice and helped us with couple clues. Hopefully next time we won't need any help. The location on the second floor- and there is a lot of parking.must try it

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Gnomes" by Play Live Escape in San Jose
review: I was really impressed with their customer service , as they were very accommodating all the way from booking to our arrival at the place . We chose Gnome room and succeeded in our mission in getting back to the real world , it took us a bit over an hour . Overall we had the best time with our friends and will be back to try more of their rooms

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Gnomes" by Play Live Escape in San Jose
review: We reserved Escape from Gnomes with my friends and it was very entertaining evening for us .Booking was easy and the room was very well set .  We solved puzzles and whenever we were stuck the team member was calling us on walkie to give us a clue . Overall fun time with my friends and made it within 59 minutes . Yey
